text: <extra_id_0> RANTES <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ( <extra_id_0> Regulated upon Activation, Normal T cell Expressed and Secreted <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ) is a chemoattractant cytokine ( chemokine ) important in the generation of inflammatory infiltrate and human immunodeficiency virus entry into immune cells .
